_header: Farewell farewell / All fresh all cheer
_description: ‘My true harte hathe slayne me’, a love letter in irregular stanzas with refrain: ‘Alas for pure pite / From cruell dethe I cannot stert / My paynes be so mortal’

Lam3597.First Lines:
Fare well fare wellAll frisk all cherefare well my hart
                    solasmy deth approchith me nere & nere…
Lam3597.Last Lines:
…Alas for pure pitemy true harte hathe slayne meAlas
                    &cAlas &c
Lam3597.Editions:
Rickert,  Edith. 
             “Verses Found at Coughton Court.” 
             Modern Philology
         31 (1933-34): 198-9: 198-9.
